choose.when: select no, category, title, regDate from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, to_char(n.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as regDate from categoryno c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryno and (n.title like '%${value}%' or n.content like '%${value}%') ) order by no desc
choose.otherwise: select no, category, title, regDate from ( select n.no, c.category, n.title, to_char(n.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as regDate from categoryno c, notice n where c.no=n.categoryno) order by no desc
